title: All Your Beauty Lyrics Goli Soda Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: All your beauty
Singer: Gana Bala
Music: SN Arunagiri
Lyrics: Gaana Bala, Mani Amudhavan

All your beauty, azhagu kannaadi
All your beauty, azhagu kannaadi
fine quality, un personality
padichu paaru English-u paper naanadi
naan fair n lovely pottu vandha super man-adi

Koyambedu market-ula vandhu paarudi
naan koni mootta thookkuravan, aana eennadi?

Up-u down-u vazhkayila vandhu pogumdi
naan appa kooda unnavittu pogamatendi

Baltti adipendi,usura kalti koduppendi
nee ippa sollu noorupera
solatti adipendi

All your beauty, azhagu kannaadi
All your beauty, azhagu kannaadi
fine quality, un personality

Paarkka paarkka vandhadhamma love thaandi
un paarvayaala bathila sonna, yes thaandi

Vellakaari pol adhegam minuminukkudhu
oru thanni lory pola vandhu enna idikkudhu (2)

Satayellaam palaplanuthaana irukkudhu
adhula achchadicha vasagamthaan enna mirattudhu (2)

Un manasa thirudave vandha kallan thaanadi
enn bayampuruthum unga appan ennaku villanthaandai.

All your beauty, azhagu kannaadi
All your beauty, azhagu kannaadi
fine quality, un personality
padichu paaru English-u paper naanadi
naan fair n lovely pottu vandha super man-adi
